thread.title: Instagram Android & iOS Updated with Direct Improvements
thread.title_full: Instagram for Android & iOS Updated with Direct Improvements - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Instagram Android & iOS Updated with Direct Improvements
text: Instagram has been making quite a lot of improvements to its Android and iOS applications. No later than last week, Instagram added the option to upload non-Square photos, as well as portrait and landscape videos. Today, developers announced many improvements to Instagram Direct, including threaded messages and sending content from user... Â»
